Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
control.enquiry.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
Manages enquiries related to BTO projects. Handles submission, retrieval, updating, and deletion of enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String project, String enquiryText)
      Allows an applicant to submit an enquiry for a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry.
      project - The project the enquiry is regarding.
      enquiryText - The text of the enquiry.

    • viewEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> viewEnquiries(Applicant applicant)
      Allows an applicant to view their enquiries.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant viewing their enquiries.
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries for the applicant.

    • editEnquiry

      public boolean editEnquiry(Applicant applicant, int enquiryID, String newEnquiryText)
      Allows an applicant to edit an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant editing the enquiry.
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to edit.
      newEnquiryText - The new text for the enquiry.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry is successfully edited, false otherwise.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(Applicant applicant, int enquiryID)
      Allows an applicant to delete an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant deleting the enquiry.
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
